field.separator.heading: Part I: Requestor Information (requestor completes this section)
field.separator.name: part1_heading

field.select.caption: Type of Dispute
field.select.name: dispute_type
field.select.choices: TWCC Refund Order Appeal=1;Medical Necessity=2;Carrier Request for Refund=3;Fee Reimbursement=4;Preauthorization=5

field.separator.heading: Part II: General Claim Information (requestor completes this section; respondent supplements information)
field.separator.name: part2_heading

field.select.caption: Carrier filed notice of denial relating to liability for or compensability of the injury that has not yet been resolved
field.select.name: denial_notice

field.select.caption: Carrier filed notice of dispute relating to extent of injury that has not yet been resolved and is related to this dispute
field.select.name: dispute_notice

field.separator.heading: Part III: Respondent Information (respondent completes this section)
field.separator.name: part3_heading

field.memo.caption: If yes, describe how it was resolved and attach documents
field.memo.name: issue_resolved_reason

field.date.caption: Return to limited type of work
field.date.name: return_to_lmtd_work

field.memo.caption: History of Occupational Injury or Illness
field.memo.name: injury_history

field.memo.caption: Laboratory, Radiographic, and/or Imaging Tests Ordered and Results
field.memo.name: lab_tests

field.select.caption: Referrals or Change of Treating Doctor
field.select.name: referrals_select

field.date.caption: Date Report Mailed to Workers Compensation Insurance Carrier
field.date.name: mailed_to_insurance

field.select.caption: Reason for Report
field.select.name: reason_for_report
field.select.choices: Subsequent Medical Report (due every 60 days after initial medical report)=1;Released to Return to Work=2;Changing Treating Doctors=3;Discharged From Hospital=4

field.memo.caption: Changes in Injured Employee's Condition, Including Clinical Assessment and Test Results
field.memo.name: change_in_condition

field.memo.caption: Compliance by Injured Employee with Recommended Treatment
field.memo.name: compliance_by_employee

field.select.caption: Employee has reached maximum medical improvement
field.select.name: max_medical_improvement

field.date.caption: Date of Medical Improvement
field.date.hint: If 'No', give the estimated date on which employee is expected to reach maximum medical improvement
field.date.name: max_medical_date

field.separator.heading: Treating Doctor's Review of Certification of Maximum Medical Improvement and Assigned Impairment Rating (See TWCC Form 69 for Instructions)
field.separator.name: review_heading

field.select.caption: Injured employee's medical condition resulting from work comp injury
field.select.name: return_to_work
field.select.choices: Return to work (w/o restrictions)=1;Return to work (w/ restrictions)=2;Prevents employee from returning to work=3

field.date.caption: Allow employee to return to work as of
field.date.name: return_date_no_restrict

field.composite.caption: Allow employee to return to work as of and through
field.composite.name: return_date_restrict_fields

field.date.caption: Allow employee to return to work as of
field.date.name: return_date_restrict_from

field.date.caption: Allow employee to return to work through
field.date.name: return_date_restrict_to

field.composite.caption: Prevents employee from returning to work as of and through
field.composite.name: prevent_return_date_fields

field.date.caption: Prevents employee from returning to work as of
field.date.name: prevent_return_date_from

field.date.caption: Prevents employee from returning to work through
field.date.name: prevent_return_date_to

field.separator.heading: Activity Restrictions (Only complete if 'Return to work (w/ restrictions)' was selected)
field.separator.name: restrictions_heading

field.select.caption: Restrictions specific to (if applicable) -
field.select.name: specific_restrictions
field.select.choices: L Hand/Wrist=LH;L Arm=LA;L Leg=LL;L Foot/Ankle=LF;R Hand/Wrist=RH;R Arm=RA;R Leg=RL;R Foot/Ankle=RF;Neck=N;Back=B

field.select.caption: Lift/Carry Restrictions (if any) -
field.select.name: lift_carry_instructions
field.select.choices: May not lift/carry objects (conditional)=1;May not perform any lifting/carrying=2;Other=3

field.integer.caption: Max hours per day of work
field.integer.name: max_hours_of_work

field.composite.caption: Sit/Stretch breaks (number per unit of time)
field.composite.name: sit_stretch_breaks_fields

field.boolean.caption: Must use crutches at all times
field.boolean.name: crutches

field.boolean.caption: Medication may make drowsy (possible safety/driving issues)
field.boolean.name: drowsy_meds

field.composite.caption: Physical medicine (# per week/# of weeks/start date/start time)
field.composite.name: phys_med_fields

field.select.caption: None. This is the last scheduled visit for this problem. At this time, no further medical care is anticipated.
field.select.name: no_services_anticipated

field.select.caption: Role of Doctor
field.select.name: doctor_role
field.select.choices: Designated doctor=1;Carrier-selected RME=2;TWCC-selected RME=3;Treating doctor=4;Referral doctor=5;Consulting doctor=6;Other doctor=7

field.integer.caption: Max Sessions
field.integer.hint: The max. number of simultaneous logins
field.integer.name: quantity

field.select.caption: Relative Date
field.select.name: date_offset
field.select.choices: Selected Date -3=-3,Selected Date -2=-2,Selected Date -1=-1,Selected Date=0,Selected Date +1=1,Selected Date +2=2,Selected Date +3=3

field.composite.caption: Pay Method/Check No. or Auth. Code
field.composite.name: pay_method_fields

field.text.caption: CPTs
field.text.hint: Please provide a comma separated list of cpts or cpt ranges, example:xxxxx,xxxxx-xxxxx,xxxxx,xxxxx-xxxxx.
field.text.name: listofcpts

field.currency.caption: Balance to Budget
field.currency.hint: Leave blank for auto-calculation of balance
field.currency.name: balance

field.select.caption: Message
field.select.name: common_message
field.select.choices: ; Medication Question = medication_question; Medication Problem = medication_problem; Wants Lab Results = want_lab_results; Has Question About Lab Results = has_question_about_lab_results; Doesn't Feel Well = does_not_feel_well; Complains Of = complains_of; Continue Same Treatment = continue_same_treatment; Schedule Appointment = schedule_appointment; Follow Up in = follow_up_in; Stop Medication = stop_medication; Start New Medication = start_new_medication; Change Medication Dose = change_medication_dose; Refill Medication = refill_medication; Call

field.select.caption: Patient
field.select.name: patientOnSelect
field.select.choices: View Profile=View Profile,View Chart=View Chart,View Account=View Account,Make Appointment=Make Appointment,

field.select.caption: Physician
field.select.name: physicianOnSelect
field.select.choices: View Schedule=View Schedule,View Profile=View Profile,Add Template=Add Template,

field.select.caption: Organization
field.select.name: orgOnSelect
field.select.choices: View Profile=View Profile,View Fee Schedules=View Fee Schedules,

field.select.caption: Action
field.select.name: verify_action
field.select.choices: Talked to Patient=Talked to Patient,Left Message=Left Message, Unable to Reach=Unable to Reach, Incorrect Phone Number=Incorrect Phone Number

field.integer.caption: AM Limits
field.integer.hint: Max # appointments of this type during AM hours
field.integer.name: am_limit

field.integer.caption: PM Limits
field.integer.hint: Max # appointments of this type during PM hours
field.integer.name: pm_limit

field.integer.caption: All Day Limits
field.integer.hint: Max # appointments of this type for entire day
field.integer.name: day_limit

field.text.caption: Caption
field.text.hint: Please provide a friendly name of the bookmark
field.text.name: caption

field.composite.caption: Payer ID/Type
field.composite.hint: If left blank, invoice will be billed to the 'Patient ID'
field.composite.name: other_payer_fields

field.text.caption: Item Name
field.text.hint: autofill for CPT, EPSDT and HCPCS codes
field.text.name: name
